As announced, I've committed the cumulative patches (+ NEWS) to R-devel, now;
svn rev 87449.

text:
*[Bug 18768] readLines incorrectly infers 'bzip2' based on false positive magic number match in rare cases*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18768>

--- Comment #3 from Michael Chirico (<mailto:michaelchirico4@gmail.com|michaelchirico4@gmail.com>) ---
Great, thanks! Fix looks great, very clean.

In test of test cases, I can only point to the user report to {data.table} that
spurred all this:

<https://github.com/Rdatatable/data.table/issues/6304>

The best solution would be to go back in time & get the bzip authors to use
some invisible characters for their magic number :)
